name: Flying Solo (2022 Team 3)
description:
You are GRENADE DUSTER, space cowboy. You ride the stars, grabbing all the loot you can along the way. Your ship was meant for a full crew, but after your last crew all quit, you decide to go it alone. Who needs them, anyways? Man the helm, tune the engine, and fight off intruders as you soar across the void!

CONTROLS:
  • W/A/S/D: Move
  • W/S: Steer Ship
  • Mouse/Left Click: Aim/Shoot
  • E: Interact
  • Esc: Pause
Installation:

Download the ZIP file, unzip it to a directory, then run the .exe file inside. You're good to go!
